TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: I have noticed a strange property of this deadly matter.
CASSAVA: As the waves wash onto this island, the deadly matter appears to be temporarily neutralized by its immersion.
CASSAVA: Furthermore, the deadly matter has proven disturbingly capable of penetrating any space.. The only protection appears to be water, which completely neutralizes its advance.
CASSAVA: If this hypothesis is true... Is that how I was able to..?
CASSAVA: ..I must focus on my research. There is a second property of this matter that I must investigate further on <color=lightblue>Timber Hearth.</color>
